getFunctionKeyInstructions.value:
[concat('To get your Function Key:
1. Go to Azure Portal
2. Navigate to Function App: ', parameters('functionAppName'), '
3. Click "App keys" in left menu
4. Copy the "default" key under "Host keys"

Or use Azure CLI:
az functionapp keys list --name ', parameters('functionAppName'), ' --resource-group ', resourceGroup().name, ' --query "functionKeys.default" -o tsv')]

windowsSetupScript.value:
[concat('# Copilot Agent 365 - Windows Setup Script
# Generated from ARM deployment
# Run this script in PowerShell to configure your local environment

$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "Copilot Agent 365 - Local Setup" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Configuration from deployment
$FUNCTION_APP_NAME = "', parameters('functionAppName'), '"
$RESOURCE_GROUP = "', resourceGroup().name, '"
$OPENAI_ENDPOINT = "', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '"
$OPENAI_KEY = "', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '"
$OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT = "', parameters('openAIDeploymentName'), '"
$STORAGE_ACCOUNT = "', parameters('storageAccountName'), '"
$FILE_SHARE = "', variables('fileShareName'), '"
$ASSISTANT_NAME = "', parameters('assistantName'), '"
$CHARACTERISTIC_DESC = "', parameters('characteristicDescription'), '"
$FUNCTION_URL = "https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function"

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Creating local.settings.json..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$localSettings = @{
    IsEncrypted = $false
    Values = @{
        FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME = "python"
        AzureWebJobsStorage = "UseDevelopmentStorage=true"
        AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY = $OPENAI_KEY
        AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT = $OPENAI_ENDPOINT
        AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION = "2024-02-01"
        AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME = $OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT
        AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME = $STORAGE_ACCOUNT
        AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME = $FILE_SHARE
        ASSISTANT_NAME = $ASSISTANT_NAME
        CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION = $CHARACTERISTIC_DESC
    }
}

$localSettings | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10 | Set-Content -Path "local.settings.json" -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host "local.settings.json created successfully!" -ForegroundColor Green

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "Setup Complete!" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "========================================" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Function App Name: $FUNCTION_APP_NAME" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "Resource Group: $RESOURCE_GROUP" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "Function URL: $FUNCTION_URL" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "NEXT STEP: Get your Function Key from Azure Portal:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "1. Go to Azure Portal" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "2. Navigate to Function App: $FUNCTION_APP_NAME" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "3. Click App keys in left menu" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "4. Copy the default key under Host keys" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Or run: az functionapp keys list --name $FUNCTION_APP_NAME --resource-group $RESOURCE_GROUP --query functionKeys.default -o tsv" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "To run locally: .\\run.ps1" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "To deploy code: func azure functionapp publish $FUNCTION_APP_NAME" -ForegroundColor Yellow
')]

macLinuxSetupScript.value:
[concat('#!/bin/bash
# Copilot Agent 365 - Mac/Linux Setup Script
# Generated from ARM deployment
# Run: chmod +x setup.sh && ./setup.sh

set -e

echo "========================================"
echo "Copilot Agent 365 - Local Setup"
echo "========================================"

# Configuration from deployment
FUNCTION_APP_NAME="', parameters('functionAppName'), '"
RESOURCE_GROUP="', resourceGroup().name, '"
OPENAI_ENDPOINT="', reference(variables('openAIResourceId')).endpoint, '"
OPENAI_KEY="', listKeys(variables('openAIResourceId'), '2023-05-01').key1, '"
OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT="', parameters('openAIDeploymentName'), '"
STORAGE_ACCOUNT="', parameters('storageAccountName'), '"
FILE_SHARE="', variables('fileShareName'), '"
ASSISTANT_NAME="', parameters('assistantName'), '"
CHARACTERISTIC_DESC="', parameters('characteristicDescription'), '"
FUNCTION_URL="https://', reference(variables('functionAppId')).defaultHostName, '/api/businessinsightbot_function"

echo ""
echo "Creating local.settings.json..."

cat > local.settings.json << EOF
{
  "IsEncrypted": false,
  "Values": {
    "FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME": "python",
    "AzureWebJobsStorage": "UseDevelopmentStorage=true",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY": "$OPENAI_KEY",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT": "$OPENAI_ENDPOINT",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION": "2024-02-01",
    "AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_NAME": "$OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT",
    "AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME": "$STORAGE_ACCOUNT",
    "AZURE_FILES_SHARE_NAME": "$FILE_SHARE",
    "ASSISTANT_NAME": "$ASSISTANT_NAME",
    "CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTION": "$CHARACTERISTIC_DESC"
  }
}
EOF

echo "local.settings.json created successfully!"

echo ""
echo "========================================"
echo "Setup Complete!"
echo "========================================"
echo ""
echo "Function App Name: $FUNCTION_APP_NAME"
echo "Resource Group: $RESOURCE_GROUP"
echo "Function URL: $FUNCTION_URL"
echo ""
echo "NEXT STEP: Get your Function Key from Azure Portal:"
echo "1. Go to Azure Portal"
echo "2. Navigate to Function App: $FUNCTION_APP_NAME"
echo "3. Click App keys in left menu"
echo "4. Copy the default key under Host keys"
echo ""
echo "Or run: az functionapp keys list --name $FUNCTION_APP_NAME --resource-group $RESOURCE_GROUP --query functionKeys.default -o tsv"
echo ""
echo "To run locally: ./run.sh"
echo "To deploy code: func azure functionapp publish $FUNCTION_APP_NAME"
')]
